title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify user can successfully login with correct email and password via Supabase Auth.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify login is successful and user is redirected to dashboard matching their role.
Verify valid session and JWT token are created.

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify the system prevents login with incorrect email or password and shows relevant error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input invalid email and/or password.
Click the login button.
Verify login fails and error message is displayed for invalid credentials.
Verify no session or JWT token is created.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify each user role (admin, monev, viewer, program_planner, program_implementer, carbon_specialist) accesses only permitted features and data.

steps.description: Login as admin user.
Verify access to all modules and management features.
Logout and login as viewer user.
Verify read-only access only to allowed data views; no edit or upload permissions.
Test role-based restrictions for all other defined roles similarly.
Verify server-side and database-level access restrictions are enforced reliably.

title: Dashboard Data Accuracy and Refresh
description: Verify the national dashboard displays correct aggregate statistics and refreshes real-time data accurately per role.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to national dashboard.
Verify total PS count, total area, RKPS status, map status, and per kabupaten data are accurate and reflect database content.
Trigger data update in database.
Verify dashboard data updates accordingly without stale or incorrect values.

title: Perhutanan Sosial Data Management - Search, Filter and Pagination
description: Verify data table for Perhutanan Sosial supports searching, filtering, and pagination correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to PS data management page.
Enter search terms and apply various filters.
Verify results match search/filter criteria.
Navigate through pagination controls.
Verify correct data is displayed per page and total count is accurate.
Test edge cases such as no matching results, very large number of results.
Verify system behaves gracefully and UI remains responsive.

title: PS Profile Detail Tabs Functionality
description: Verify each tab (Ringkasan, Kelembagaan, Dokumen, Peta, Galeri, Kegiatan, Catatan) in PS profile displays correct data and allows allowed interactions.

steps.description: Open detailed profile of any PS unit.
Verify Ringkasan tab displays summary data correctly.
Switch to Kelembagaan tab and verify organizational data is accurate.
Switch to Dokumen tab, verify document list and viewing/downloading functionality.
Check Peta tab for proper map visualization and markers.
Verify Galeri tab shows images and supports image viewing.
Check Kegiatan tab lists activities correctly.
Validate Catatan tab for notes display and addition if permitted.

title: Excel Import Workflow with Validation and Error Handling
description: Verify the system imports bulk data from Excel files correctly, validating format, previewing data, handling errors, and preventing invalid imports.

steps.description: Login as Admin or Monev user.
Navigate to Excel import upload page.
Upload a valid Excel file with correct formatting and data.
Verify data is parsed and previewed accurately before import.
Confirm and start import process.
Verify import completes successfully and data is stored in system.
Upload an Excel file with invalid format or corrupt data.
Verify error messages indicate issues and import is rejected.
Attempt import with partial invalid data.
Verify system highlights errors and does not import invalid rows; valid rows import if applicable.

title: Carbon Project Creation and Status Tracking
description: Validate that carbon specialists can create carbon projects, track project status, and outputs comply with standards.

steps.description: Login as carbon_specialist user.
Navigate to Carbon Projects management module.
Create a new carbon project with valid inputs.
Verify project is saved, listed, and status tracking is available.
Update project status through allowed stages.
Verify status updates reflect correctly and are visible.
Check output documents and exports meet defined standards.

title: Program Management and DRAM Lifecycle
description: Verify program planners and admins can create, edit, and monitor programs and associated DRAM documents throughout their lifecycle.

steps.description: Login as program_planner or admin.
Create new program and associated DRAM document.
Verify program and DRAM save correctly and appear in lists.
Edit existing program and DRAM details.
Verify changes are saved and reflected immediately.
Monitor program progress and update mitigation actions.
Verify status updates and actionable items are tracked.

title: Implementation Progress Update and Evidence Upload
description: Verify program implementers can update implementation progress and upload proof documents which are stored and displayed correctly.

steps.description: Login as program_implementer user.
Navigate to assigned programs and open progress update form.
Enter progress details and upload supporting evidence files.
Verify progress updates save successfully.
Verify uploaded evidence files are stored and accessible.

title: Monitoring and Evaluation (Monev) Reporting and Indicator Tracking
description: Verify Monev users can record target vs actual indicator data accurately and generate verifiable Monev reports.

steps.description: Login as monev user.
Access monitoring and evaluation module.
Input indicator target data and record actual realization data.
Verify data is saved and indicators are properly tracked.
Generate Monev report.
Verify report contents are accurate, complete, and consistent with recorded data.

title: PDD Generator Document Creation and Data Integrity
description: Verify Carbon Specialists can generate Project Design Documents (PDD) automatically from stored project data without artificial data creation.

steps.description: Login as carbon_specialist user.
Navigate to PDD Generator module.
Select an existing carbon project and generate PDD document.
Verify the generated PDD document reflects only stored project data precisely.
Verify no artificial or fabricated data appears in the document.
Verify document is downloadable in defined format.

title: Multi-language Support and Language Switching
description: Verify the application supports Bahasa Indonesia and Chinese Traditional languages fully and UI language switches dynamically without errors.

steps.description: Login to the application.
Locate and use the UI language switcher.
Switch language to Chinese Traditional.
Verify all UI text, labels, buttons, menus, and messages appear correctly in Chinese Traditional.
Switch back to Bahasa Indonesia.
Verify all UI text returns to Bahasa Indonesia correctly.
Verify no broken text or layout issues occur during language switching.

title: User Profile View and Edit with Validation
description: Verify users can view and edit their profile information with proper validation and data persistence.

steps.description: Login and navigate to user profile page.
Verify profile displays current user information.
Navigate to profile edit page.
Modify user information with valid and invalid inputs.
Verify form validation prevents invalid inputs and shows appropriate error messages.
Save valid changes.
Verify changes are saved and reflected in profile.

title: Security - Authentication and Authorization Controls
description: Verify security mechanisms protect the application against common web vulnerabilities and enforce authentication and authorization robustly.

steps.description: Attempt CSRF attack by submitting malicious form requests.
Verify CSRF protection prevents unauthorized form submissions.
Attempt XSS attack by injecting script in inputs.
Verify inputs are sanitized and scripts do not execute.
Test SQL Injection attempts in input fields and API endpoints.
Verify no injection is successful and input is safely handled.
Verify RBAC restricts access at server and database level using RLS (Row Level Security).
Confirm users cannot access data or perform actions beyond their permissions.

title: Performance - Page Load, API Response, and File Upload
description: Verify application meets performance standards on page loads, API responses, and Excel file uploads under normal and peak conditions.

steps.description: Measure homepage and dashboard page load time under normal conditions.
Verify load times meet defined performance criteria.
Test API response times for common data fetch and update operations.
Verify API response times are within acceptable limits.
Upload large Excel files for import.
Verify upload and processing completes within expected timeframe without failures or timeouts.
